bibl.title: Comoedia Dukiana.
bibl.note: Fragment of Old Comedy (or Middle Comedy) from a mummy cartonnage. The scene, composed in trochaic tetrameters, is a lively exchange between a cook and his interlocutor about the extravagant preparation for a banquet of a huge fish, a silouros. Provenance unknown, late third or early second century B.C.
bibl.seg: Fragment of Old Comedy (or Middle Comedy) from a mummy cartonnage.
